        boardWidth - Width of the Board to create
        boardHeight - Height of the Board to create

      • getShip

        public Ship getShip(int x,
           int y)
        Returns a reference to a Ship if it occupies coordinate (x,y) on the board.
        Parameters:
        x - X Coordinate
        y - Y Coordinate
        Returns:
        A Ship if one exists at the position, null otherwise

      • getShip

        public Ship getShip(int shipID)
        Searches the Ship storage for the given shipID
        Parameters:
        shipID - ID of the Ship to search for
        Returns:
        The Ship if it is on the board, null otherwise

      • getShips

        public java.util.ArrayList<Ship> getShips()
        Returns references to all ships on the board within an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all ships.

      • getShipPosition

        public Position getShipPosition(int shipID)
        Searches the Ship storage for the given shipID and returns the corresponding Ship's position
        Parameters:
        shipID - ID of the Ship to search for.
        Returns:
        A Ship's position if it is on the board, null otherwise

      • placeShip

        public boolean placeShip(Ship ship,
                Position position)
        Attempts to place a Ship on the board.
        Parameters:
        ship - The Ship to place
        position - A Position object indicating how the ship should be placed.
        Returns:
        True if the ship could be placed, false otherwise.

      • removeShip

        public Ship removeShip(int x,
              int y)
        Removes the ship occupying the given x,y coordinate and returns a reference to the ship.
        Parameters:
        x - X Coordinate
        y - Y Coordinate
        Returns:
        A reference to the Ship removed, null if no Ship could be removed.

      • removeShip

        public Ship removeShip(int shipID)

      • moveShip

        public boolean moveShip(int shipID,
               Position newPosition)
        Attempts to move a ship from one position to another by first removing the ship from the board, checking if the requested position is available and then placing the ship. If the position was not available, it is placed back in its original position.
        Parameters:
        shipID - ID of Ship to move
        newPosition - Position to move the boat to.
        Returns:
        True if Ship could be moved, false otherwise

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the board to it's post-constructor state by removing all ships.

      • shipCount

        public int shipCount()
        Reports the number of ships that exist on the board.
        Returns:
        Number of Ships on the board.
